name: Spectre (itch) (AnaO2008)
description:
In this game players control a ghost as they navigate through the ghost's house. Each room presents a new challenge as players help the ghost make choices to reach acceptance of their own death. Discover the truth behind the ghost's death while exploring  a large world of unique challenges or puzzles. 

Warning: This may be an emotional game for some players. 

Controls:

Move (WASD)

Start (Shift)

Interact (Alt)
